content: That's great advice! I think I'll schedule my Q&A session on a Wednesday at 1 pm EST, which is right in the middle of my followers' most active period. I'll make sure to promote it in advance using Instagram's features and create a branded hashtag to track the conversation. One more thing, do you think I should offer any incentives to encourage followers to participate in the Q&A session, like a giveaway or a special discount?
